text: Luca Patuelli (born July 28, 1984 in Montreal, Quebec), nicknamed Lazylegz, is a Canadian b-boy.Biography of Luca "Lazylegz" Patuelli, citizenshift.org He was born with Arthrogryposis (multiplex congenital), a muscle disorder which affects his legs.Luca “Lazylegz” Patuelli And His Ill-Abilities Break-Dancing Crew , August 25, 2009 He graduated from Concordia University in Montreal with a BComm in 2009. Patuelli performed at the 2010 Winter Paralympics opening ceremony in Vancouver.Games were life-changing experience for breakdancer, The Gazette (Montreal), March 24, 2010 In 2015, he was awarded a Meritous Service Decoration for his work making dance more accessible to those with physical disabilities.Governor General Presents 43 Meritorious Service Decorations (Civil Division) ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:America's Got Talent contestants Category:Canadian breakdancers Category:People from Montreal Category:People with arthrogryposis Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Canadian dancers
